# Ethereum Reporting

## Goals

1. Snapshots (current balances)
2. List transactions

## Exploration

### Transactions

- All transactions → Etherscan ✅
- ERC-20 transactions → Etherscan ✅

### Balances

- Current ETH balance → Etherscan ✅
- Current ERC-20 balance → Etherscan PRO ❌, Node RPC ✅
- List of ERC-20 balances? Gotta check transactions... ✅
